DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study examine physiological adaptation oxygen transport chain high-intensity exercise moderate exercise overweight obese human . The main goal : 1 . To investigate effective short-and long-interval training term VO2max , pulmonary diffusion , cardiac output , endothelial function mitochondrial function . 2 . How physiological adaptation affect aerobic endurance performance , train reduce risk cardiovascular disease related overweight obesity .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise-intensity Physiological Adaptations Overweight Obese
DOC.criteria: BMI > 25 Exclusion criterion cardiovascular disease another disease consistent high physical activity . Subjects exercise regularly study .
